column1: The Purple Pig////we ordered the hummus
column2: calamari and pork belly. the hummus was probably my favorite surprisingly! the flavors especially with the soft boiled egg worked so well together. and since it's hummus
column3: you don't feel guilty eating it! the calamari was good but not my favorite. i definitely prefer the fried version. :) lastly
column4: the pork belly was good as well - not mindblowing though.
